Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small NovikovAlgebra Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small NovikovAlgebra AllSmallNovikovAlgebra is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic novikovalgebra models from orders 2 to 3.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .
Dependency This package has no dependencies .
